name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 30, a netizen who specializes in sharing the Tiananmen flag-raising ceremony posted that around 4 a.m., someone defecated at the flag-raising ceremony site, and because there were so many people at the scene, the ground was covered with feces.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, public security departments in many places announced the cancellation of self-media accounts.
It is said to be related to the standardization of new media construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
[To satirize the uneven distribution of educational resources, netizens spontaneously established a university]
Recently, the online virtual university "Shanhe University" established by netizens from the "Four Provinces of Shanhe (Shandong, Shanxi, Henan, and Hebei)" who are mainly college entrance examination candidates has become popular, causing heated discussions and being reported by many media.
The proposal of "Shanhe University" originated from a joke by a netizen on June 27. He proposed that if 3.43 million candidates from the four provinces each contributed 1,000 yuan, a total of more than 30 billion yuan, then a comprehensive university located at the junction of the four provinces could be built.
In the afternoon, the school emblem, school motto, campus card, admission notice and other forms of "Shanhe University" were designed one after another, and the virtual university was quickly established.
This move is an expression of the pain and helplessness brought about by the uneven distribution of educational resources and the internal competition of the college entrance examination in the four provinces by netizens from the four provinces.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of June 30, the owners of Kaisa's unfinished building in Qingyuan, Guangdong went to the Qingyuan Municipal Government to protest for their rights. They were violently driven away by the police and security guards. Two buses were used to carry the owners who were protesting. The owners were taken away by the police. Some were interrogated until 2 a.m. and then released. To date, some owners have not been released and have been recorded and had their blood drawn.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 30, 138 security guards of the Hangzhou Asian Games collectively petitioned for their rights because the intermediary ran away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 1, an explosion occurred at a chemical plant in Guixi City, Jiangxi Province. The local emergency management department said that the cause of the accident was silicone oil ignition. Firefighters are currently extinguishing the fire. There are currently no casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 29, at the Nantianmen Gate of Mount Tai, people held national flags and banners reading "Chinese people oppose worshipping foreign things" to welcome the sunrise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Topics related to Shanhe University were banned
